item.description:
@HAIHAIHAI wrote:

if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
sM(“You are too far to range your enemy!”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
}

this is my coding for following with range and it doesn’t seem to work, any ideas what’s wrong with it?

Thanks!
